title: This is for you Richard and Cath
brief_description: Dedicated to her son and daughter, Lesley’s tribute to her late husband recalls the love they shared for each other. From the place where they first met, to the last place they spent time together. Created as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ workshop in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
